findings.title: Bypass of mintingAllowance in mint()
findings.description: The minter can issue more tokens than his/her minting allowance due to improper validation of input amount with the minting allowance.

findings.title: Suggested immutable Usage for Gas Efficiency
findings.description: Declare state variables as `immutable` to reduce gas costs by minimizing storage reading and writing.

findings.title: Summary
findings.description: Here is a summary of our findings after analyzing the wBETH implementation.
